Components.Label: Delivery Place
Components.Query: {    "sql": "select * from [Terminal] as ds",    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from [Terminal] as ds"}

Components.Label: Shipper
Consignee
Print
Components.Query: WITH Sumcont AS ( SELECT SUM(ct1.PKG) AS PKG1, SUM(ct1.Weight) AS weight1, SUM(ct1.CBM) AS cbm1 FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct1 LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm1 ON ct1.EntityId = sm1.Id WHERE sm1.Id = '{Id}' GROUP BY sm1.Id ) SELECT ISNULL(sm.HblNo,'') AS HBLNo, ISNULL(sm.ShipperDes,'') AS shippertext, LEFT(sm.ShipperDes, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ShipperDes) - 1) AS Shipperts, LEFT(sm.ConsigneeDes, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ConsigneeDes)- 1) AS Consigneename, SUBSTRING( sm.ConsigneeDes, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ConsigneeDes) + 1, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ConsigneeDes, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ConsigneeDes) + 1) - CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ConsigneeDes) - 1 ) AS ConsigneeAdd, sm.MblNo AS mbl, ISNULL(customer.CompanyName,'') AS Customers, FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.EtaDate,''),'dd/MM/yyyy') as ETA, ISNULL(sm.ConsigneeDes,'') AS consigneetext, ISNULL(sm.NotifyPartyDes,'') AS NotyDes, ISNULL(sm.Vessel,'') AS Feedervessel, sm.OceanVesselVoy, ISNULL(sm.OceanVessel,'') AS VEssel, ISNULL(POl.Name,'') AS POLName, ISNULL(POD.Name,'') AS PODName, ISNULL(destination.Name,'') AS Destination, isnull(payableat.Name,'') as Payable, isnull(sm.NumberOriginalIdText,'') AS numberbill, CASE WHEN sm.ShippingMark IS NOT NULL THEN ' Shipping Marks: ' + CHAR(10) + sm.ShippingMark ELSE '' END AS SPMK, ISNULL(sm.DetailsGoods,'') AS DetailsGoodstext, ISNULL( sm.ForDeliveryGoodsDes,'') AS Deliverygoods, ISNULL(charge.Name,'') AS Chageterm, ISNULL(place.Name,'') AS placeissue, FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.IssueDate,''),'dd MMM, yy') AS dateissue, ISNULL(receipt.Name,'') AS placereceipt, ISNULL(deliveryplace.Name,'') AS deliveryplace , ISNULL(typemove.Name,'') AS Typeofmove, ISNULL(caluse.Name,'') AS clause, FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.SaillingDate,''),'dd MMM, yyyy') AS saillingdate, ISNULL(sm.ContainerText,'') AS quantityofcontainer, ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unitpkg, ISNULL(sm.DemFree,0) AS DEM, FORMAT((SELECT PKG1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.PKG1 IS NOT NULL),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumpkg, FORMAT((SELECT weight1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.weight1 IS NOT NULL ),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumweight, FORMAT((SELECT cbm1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.cbm1 IS NOT NULL),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumcbm FROM dbo.Shipment sm LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POL ON POL.Id = sm.PolId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner customer ON customer.Id = sm.CustomerId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id = sm.PlaceReceiptId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData payableat ON payableat.Id = sm.FreightPayableId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData charge ON charge.Id = sm.FreightChargeId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData place ON place.Id = sm.PlaceIssueId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal receipt ON receipt.Id = sm.PlaceReceiptId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal deliveryplace ON deliveryplace.Id = sm.PlaceDeliveryId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData typemove ON typemove.Id = sm.TypeMoveId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData caluse ON caluse.Id = sm.ClauseId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=sm.UnitId WHERE sm.Id='{Id}' SELECT ISNULL(contype.Name,'') AS consize, ISNULL(ct.ContainerNo,'') AS ContNo, ISNULL(ct.SealNo,'') AS Seal, format(ISNULL(ct.PKG,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS Qty, ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unit, format(ISNULL(ct.Weight,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS GW, format(ISNULL(ct.CBM,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS CBM FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON ct.EntityId=sm.Id LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData contype ON ct.ContainerTypeId = contype.Id LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=ct.UnitId WHERE ct.EntityId=sm.Id AND sm.Id='{Id}' SELECT SUM(ct.PKG) AS pkg3, SUM(ct.Weight) AS weight3 , SUM(ct.CBM) AS cbm3 FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment shipt ON ct.EntityId=shipt.Id WHERE shipt.Id='{Id}'
